/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their facades adorned with red and white accents that stand out against the clear blue sky. The street itself is lined with trees, their green leaves adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the bustling city life. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The overall scene is a blend of urban development and natural beauty, a characteristic feature of Beijing's cityscape.
